articles.title: Steve Witkoff to meet Volodymyr Zelensky for latest Ukraine war talks - BBC
articles.description: Donald Trump's envoy will meet the Ukrainian president and European leaders in Berlin to discuss the latest peace plan.
articles.content: US President Donald Trump's overseas envoy will travel to Germany this weekend to meet Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and European leaders for the latest round of high-level talks on ending t… [+4600 chars]
